attributes.action: create a law banning the theft of our hair for use in chemical weapons.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
That's right people, there is a possibility that we will soon be forced to donate our hair for a refinement process that creates a powerful nerve agent.
THIS MUST BE STOPPED!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
